summary: McDull is not the brightest kid on the block, but he continuously tries to do his best to please his mother. Still it seems he may not be destined for great things like she wishes, but McDull strives to try anyway.
cast: Anthony Chau-Sang Wong|Jan Lamb|Chun-Wai Lee|Sandra Kwan Yue Ng
keywords: second part|second in trilogy|part of trilogy|working class family|failure
title: Mak Dau goo si
